king arwin westchester.description: A young man, likely not very far into his twenties. Upon his thick brown hair sits the Antiquan crown, made from pure white gold and decorated with more diamonds than most people have seen in their lives.
king arwin westchester.response: Hello citizen, if you would like to serve Antiqua, I recommend you start by helping out around town. Once you've earned a summons slip from another citizen, come see me and I may have work for you. Please enjoy all of the fruits our proud city has to offer.
